bug.author: jazzsir
bug.summary: "Extra Resources" field doesn't have any default value on the new server creation page
bug.description:
/kind bug What steps did you take and what happened: [A clear and concise description of what the bug is.] On a server creation screen, we have to insert something to create a server. What did you expect to happen: As previous releases, a default value "{}" should be set in advance. Anything else you would like to add: [Miscellaneous information that will assist in solving the issue.] If it is valid, I can push a PR Environment:
Kubeflow version: (version number can be found at the bottom left corner of the Kubeflow dashboard): kfctl version: (use kfctl version): v1.0-0-g94c35cf Kubernetes platform: (e.g. minikube): kubeadm Kubernetes version: (use kubectl version): 1.15.9 OS (e.g. from /etc/os-release): Ubuntu 18.04.03
